comment: Very caring professor, she's always wanting to engage with the class and students individually. You work with the same group the entire semester, but she will always give credit where it's due if you talk to her. overall a very enjoyable class.

Dr. L isn't tech-savvy at all and hasn't updated a lot of the things on D2L. Every week, you have a discussion board post which is with your group that you are assigned at the beginning of the semester and work with for the whole semester. She doesn't grade accurately at times and seems not to know how to work technology at all.
Extremely easy grader, 2 quizzes and 2 discussions every week (took this in summer). Also three essays. Take her she's good.

Took this class in the summer. She is a chill grader and gives good feedback on your essays. There was 2 quizzes and 2 Discussion posts per week (probably would only be one in the fall/spring), and three papers. This class was pretty easy overall.

Professor Lepadatu is great! Her class was online and I found it to be very easy. She's an easy and reasonable grader, I got a 100 on both the midterm and final papers. No exams in this online course, only two papers and weekly discussion posts. I earned a 90 even with skipping two weeks of work. The textbook was helpful in writing the papers.
I took this class as a senior, but now this is a change. She is so caring and genuinely wants you to do good. I wish I wasn't so far in my schooling or I would have taken her for multiple classes!

She is very flexible in her discussion requirements, which is great for online students. The tests are easy if you understand the material. Very few graded items in general. Probably the most laidback class I've had, and I still learned because the textbooks were good. Allows the final reaction paper to be turned in late, and offers extra credit.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: The people on here who dont like her prob didnt come to class/ try. She's a great prof, very sweet, kind, easygoing, intelligent. If you attend class you will know exactly what is happening & the grading/assignments are fair. I learned a lot from this course (migration) & i also took her for research methods online. She really cares for students

Very unprofessional and inconsiderate. She does not grade according to her syllabus. Scheduled off campus field trip without advanced notice and did not include it in the syllabus! She does not belong on a college campus! She change nearly everything on the syllabus and added much more towards the end. Extreme lack of common sense...

Hands down best professor I've taken at KSU. Passionate, caring, informative, the whole deal. I took her new sociology of immigration class on a whim and it was the best decision I made while at Kennesaw. (Coming from a psych major). Got an opportunity to present research at symposium.  KSU needs more professors like Dr. Lepadatu. Take her class!

Dr. Lepadatu is a good professor in person I'm sure, but online she's a mess.  Took forever to get grades back, email responses were very slow, and directions for projects were vague and ambiguous.  She also kept adding assignments that weren't on the syllabus.   Take her in person, not online.  It was stressful trying to figure her class out.
rating_tags: Participation matters--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Dr. Lepadatu was great in person but online is pretty scattered and not present. She assigns a survey, SPSS project and a research proposal (most is done by group which helps but you have the option to go solo). I recommend going into it with a study buddy and meet with her in person as often as you can for clarification on anything! Fair grader
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Very nice and so beautiful. Her looks are more than enough reason not to skip class. Highly recommend.
Very sweet professor, and very interesting course. She cares whether her students learn and succeed. Highly recommend this professor.

Most of the credit in this class is easy to earn. Participation is graded however she doesn't always take attendance. I didn't write any papers the two tests were online. There was a group presentation.

Only a midterm and final, both all multiple choice and she curves. Four page paper. Participation matters but only four discussion posts required all semester. I did two responses to classmates at midterm and an original post with a response on final post and got 100 on both. She also really cares about her students. I would take her again!
She's pretty awesome! Best online course. Weekly discussion, midterm, two assignments, and a final. She kind of takes her time to reply back to you but no biggie.
Great Instructor! Very helpful.  Instructions were clear.  Study Guides were useful.  Excellent for an Online course.  Readings are interesting.  Exercises are helpful.

I took this class online. I like many other students dread taking research methods. But after taking Dr. Lepadatu I shouldn't have been worried. The class content is relevant and "extremely" easy! Two M/C test, one discussion per week, and two assignments. Take Dr. Lepadatu, you won't be sorry.

This course requires you to purchase or borrow from a friend so you can participate in discussions. This course consist of one paper, class participation/ discussion, and one group project. No quizzes and no test. Easy grade and professor is willing to help you. All you need to do is ask. Don't wait at the last minute to ask for help.

Great professor! Very Smart and passionate about subject! Explains concepts well and not hard to make a good grade! Course consists mainly of a midterm group research project in which is presented and a final paper. Also receive grades for activities, class discussion, and participation. Great course and professor!
She is awesome and a great resource.

Great class! she takes roll so make sure that you are there it is apart of your grade. Very laid back and lenient class One paper, interview project and a group project that is not that difficult. During the whole semester we learn about Romania. Do not buy the book just google the information ;)

Overall easy course. Had a paper, presentation & midterm. Has an accent, very knowledgeable about applying sociology to real world after college. Dressed nice. Had a take home, online exam. Classes got boring sometimes, used powerpoint w/ lectures mostly & engaged class in discussions okay. Told not so funny jokes sometimes too.

Research methods, gives you choice of final exam or paper project. VERY VERY VERY easy. Toward the end of class, you're doing extra credit. Gives some assignments back to be redone for a better grade. LOVE HER i am taking her for senior seminar!. EASY grader... Very sweet and understanding.

No test. 2 papers. Easy A it was actually my first A in college. Has an accent but the class is very easy if you try.  Many of the students wrote the papers the night before they were due and recieved A's.  If I could get an A so can you. Attendence not mandatory.

Dr. Lepdatu is an amazing person and teacher. She is so nice and helpful. She will work with you outside of class and help you out on anything you don't comprehend. Not doing your readings only hurts your own participation points.

I don't think I really learned anything new from this class-except for the fact that the majority were very liberal!!  The work outside of class was tedious. Final research project was probably my LEAST favorite thing about this class. Otherwise, she's helpful and understanding if you show effort. But I wish I learned something when I took her.

She'd bring topics up n class 4 discussion, but she didn't teach us a thing. Strange, I thought u had 2 teach 2 b a teacher. Great class 4 a BS grade. Just make sure u look the topic up n book b4 class & do quick search 4 stats on the net (she prefers u print these, i brought my laptop & she seemed upset). no tests/quizes, just discussion.
Loved her class.  Very friendly and approachable.  Caring and understanding.  You'll love her, too!
No Comments

She is amazing! She's very helpful, all you have to do is ask. Homework is almost always reading, and the lectures are more interesting than most because they are discussion-based. I would highly recommend her.

She is a very interesting person and teacher.  Her class was wonderful and easy.  I made a A.  Attendance was not mandatory but I still went and found it interesting.  Hope to take her in future classes.
Awesome teacher, very interesting.
Excellent Teacher.  Very smart.  Great class, easy A.  NO TESTS

This class was super easy! If you do not get an 'A', you should defiantely not be in college. Everything is evened out, so your grade is not riding on one specific thing. The only test is take-home, and she is very sweet. I would reccommend her to anyone, and I am hoping to take some of her other classes in the future!
